author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks to KIOXIA for sponsoring this video! Check them out at:
https://americas.kioxia.com/en-us/business/ssd/enterprise-ssd.html?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=LinusTechTips&utm_campaign=WHALE+LAN+KIOXIA+Enterprise+SSD
https://americas.kioxia.com/en-us/business/ssd/data-center-ssd.html?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=LinusTechTips&utm_campaign=WHALE+LAN+KIOXIA+Data+Center+SSD

Majority of the time, Smash Champs is just a badminton facility. But then you might ask, “Why did you hook it up with fiber optic networking, on-site servers, and so much power?”. Well, dear viewer, we are going to host the most BALLING LANs you’ve ever seen, with the help of KIOXIA and our new cache server.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1617400-i-paid-100-people-to-test-1-computer/

Check out the parts from the build! 
Check out Eaton's Tripp Lite UPS Series: https://www.eaton.com/cloudups
Check out the SilverStone rm23-502-MINI: https://lmg.gg/jI7nO
Buy an ASRock EPYC4000D4U Micro-ATX AM
title: I paid 100 people to test 1 computer.
